title: Safari Lodges in Africa
metaTitle: Best Safari Lodges in Africa - Luxury Wildlife Experience
metaDescription: Experience the ultimate African safari at these exceptional luxury lodges, where wildlife and comfort meet.
excerpt: Experience the ultimate African safari at these exceptional luxury lodges, where wildlife and comfort meet.
body:
Experience the ultimate African safari at these exceptional luxury lodges...

South Africa:
- Singita Lebombo: Modern luxury in Kruger National Park
- Royal Malewane: Classic safari experience with excellent guides
- Londolozi: Family-owned with exceptional wildlife viewing

Kenya:
- Angama Mara: Stunning views over the Maasai Mara
- Giraffe Manor: Unique experience with resident giraffes
- Ol Donyo Lodge: Luxury in the Chyulu Hills

Tanzania:
- Singita Grumeti: Exclusive concession in the Serengeti
- Four Seasons Safari Lodge: Luxury in the heart of the Serengeti
- Ngorongoro Crater Lodge: Dramatic setting with wildlife

Botswana:
- Mombo Camp: Exceptional wildlife in the Okavango Delta
- Zarafa Camp: Intimate luxury in private concession
- Sandibe Okavango: Contemporary design in wilderness

Pro tip: Consider combining different lodges in various locations to experience diverse ecosystems and wildlife. Book well in advance, especially for peak season.
author: David Thompson
